kizuna_home_a_01:
Welcome to the home economics classroom.
I consider this to be my very own castle of sorts.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_a_03:
Rumors of your activities always seem to be
bombarding me from all sides.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_a_04:
Indeed. People from all over have been talking
about how strong of a battler you are and the\r
amazing Pokémon you take along with you.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_a_05:
You are quite the object of everyone’s interest—
though I imagine that may be a bother for you.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_a_06:
The home economics classroom is something of a
place of rest for the academy’s students, you see.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_a_07:
Here, they delight in sharing the latest gossip and
the like while enjoying a light snack.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_a_08:
[VAR BD06(0000)]You come up quite often in those talks recently,
M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. So much so\r
that\r
I\r
find\r
myself\r
intrigued.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_a_09:
If it is not a burden for you, I would very much
enjoy having you come see me again sometime.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_a_system_01: You became slightly closer with Mr. Saguaro!
